data.headline: Junior UX Designer and Researcher
data.summary: Passionate UX Designer with a strong academic background in human-computer interaction. Skilled in user research, interaction design, and prototyping. Dedicated to creating intuitive and user-centered digital experiences. Eager to apply my knowledge and contribute to innovative projects.

experience.title: UX Design Intern
experience.paragraph: Collaborated with a team of designers and developers to create user-friendly interfaces for a variety of clients. Conducted user research, including interviews and usability testing, to gain insights and inform design decisions. Designed high-fidelity prototypes and presented them to stakeholders, receiving positive feedback and implementing improvements.

experience.title: Research Assistant
experience.paragraph: Supported a research project on the impact of emerging technologies on user experience. Conducted literature reviews, assisted with data collection and analysis, and contributed to the development of research methodologies. Presented findings at a departmental seminar, demonstrating strong communication and collaboration skills.

projects.name: Redesign of University Website
projects.description: Conducted user research, created wireframes and prototypes, and collaborated with developers to redesign the university's website, improving usability and accessibility.

projects.name: Mobile App for Fitness Tracking
projects.description: Designed and tested a mobile app for fitness tracking, incorporating user feedback and iterating on the design to create an intuitive and engaging user experience.

data.photo_prompt: Professional LinkedIn-style headshot. Friendly, confident, and approachable expression. Wearing a smart, collared shirt against a simple, neutral background.
